skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: epic hero adventure
des:
Epic Hero Adventure is a choose your own adventure story, where YOU are the hero. 

The year is 2,577. Earthgog society is once again at war with the Syzygy, an enemy race of beings who have evolved the ability to split into multiple separate entities. Intel indicates that they have developed a weapon that will ensure the destruction of your Earthgog civilization. 

You are a mutant, genetically gifted with ever changing epic powers. The Scientific Council decreed that you lay dormant in a stasis chamber until the appropriate genetic codes were developed to allow you to control your mutant abilities. You have been asleep for over 16 years.

With the fate of humanity once again at stake, it is time to wake you up. You will be faced with difficult decisions, each of which will determine your future. Will you survive the hidden dangers? Or will you - and the rest of humanity - perish?


Things You Can Say:
Say "repeat" if you didn't hear what was said.
Say “previous choice” to go back one scene if you don't like the choice you made.
Say “replay scene” to hear the current scene again.
Say "skip scene" if you want to skip part of the story and go right to the next decision.
Say “start over” to start your current story over from the beginning.
Say "stop" or "exit" at any time and all progress will be saved.
If you need help, just ask.


Whats Included:
---------------------
- Over 15 scenes of a professionally written story, with more on the way!
- Immersive high quality audio. 
- Music and sound effects leveraging Alexa's new APLA tool for maximum quality.
- Beautiful illustrations to accompany each scene for all echo devices, including the Fire Tv!
- Touch screen compatibility for all relevant echo devices.
- Progress tracking so the user can pick up where they left off.
